restructureit.utils

Class QualityMeasurementTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • restructureit.utils.Task
      • restructureit.utils.QualityMeasurementTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITask

    public class QualityMeasurementTask
extends Task
    QualityMeasurementTask controls the quality measurement of code. It is responsible for building an AST for the given input sources and measuring each quality attribute. It then creates a Metrics summary and Quality Report.
